00030 void ClothParticle::update()
00031 {
00032     if(m_fixed == false)
00033     {
00034     integrate(m_t,m_timestep);
00035     m_t+=m_timestep;
00036     }
00037 }

00039 ngl::Vec3 ClothParticle::motionFunction(const State &_state, float _t)
00040 {
